name: Clash of 2022
description:
Game still in development process.

A platform fighter with characters made by various students!
Attack your opponent to rack up percent, higher percents knock opponents farther!
Be the first to knock your opponent off the playing stage 3 times to win!

Currently only 1 playable character for the development build.
2 Players required, controller only.

Controls (May not match up to certain controllers):
Joystick: Move

A: Attack
B: Special Attack
Joystick + A/B: Directional Attack

X/Y: Jump

Shoulder Buttons: Rolling on ground, Air Stride in air


Please understand that some gameplay elements are not fully functional and bugs may be present.
